creator: rahil.jf@gmail.com
text:
I have a problem with xwpfDocument. i want to create a docx with a xwpfTable in it. but i need to set text direction right to left.
i can not set text direction in xwpf. please help me.
thanks.
Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, and proposing fixes. Please ask use questions on the mailing list - http://poi.apache.org/mailinglists.html
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
